description:
🎤 First speaker, Gabriele Lombardi - CTO of ARGO Vision, kicked off the event #Py4AI with "Anything: Road to Zero-Shot Learning in Computer Vision".

👀 For those who couldn't attend, we've received numerous inquiries about when #Py4AI talks will be released online. Your enthusiasm hasn't gone unnoticed - All #Py4AI talks are now available on this channel!

✅Free access, anytime, anywhere to this wealth of knowledge and insights from our expert speakers.

👉Head over to our social media for more updates from our stellar lineup of speakers!

#ComputerVision #ZeroShotLearning #AI #MachineLearning #Py4AI #ARGOVision #TechTalks
title: Anything: Road to Zero-shot Learning in Computer Vision by G. Lombardi |  #Py4AI Talks
